TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMCBUTTON extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 包含用于创建工具栏上的按钮的值。

span.span: Contains values that are used to create buttons on a toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用 MMCBUTTON 结构和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 的编程的详细信息，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the MMCBUTTON structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
